author: Chris S
comment: Got all excited when the update came out. I thought it was finally getting customizations! Still a great face though! And maybe a different ambient mode! This is still one of my favorites though, and I think it shows the potential of a smart watch screen vs. a regular watch.
title: Aww

author: Adam Johnson
comment: Great looking watch face that is easy to read and matches many outfit styles. I have yet to run into any problems with this watch face! Can't wait for customization to come out soon!
title: Simple and Elegant

author: Nick Hewitt
comment: I didn't buy a smart-watch to have it imitate a conventional watch, and this nails it. More features would be nice but I'm not sure how that could be done without detracting from the overall esthetic.
title: Simple enough

author: Filipe Governa
comment: Good watchface with exemplary permissions (none) and nice clean design, but no weather info, can't disable ambient mode or make it look like normal, can't hide peek cards in ambient mode, can't vibrate hourly, and poor support ("customizations" have been "coming soon" for 1+ years...).
title: Dislike it

author: Geoff MDB
comment: Has potential but it appears the developer has abandoned this app. Brilliant design and a shame they gave up on it. Only thing I'd like to see is a day /date and would gladly pay for this app. Shame is abandonware

author: Blake Rohde
comment: Nice looking app but it looks like it doesn't have a sleep mode or it is not working on my Fossil Q Founder. I see the watch face dim for a few hundred milliseconds then go back to the same image. There doesn't seem to be a low power mode like all other watch faces I've used. Is this expected behavior? I'm concerned using this face will hurt my battery life but I haven't been using the watch face long enough to know... Thank you
title: No sleep mode?

author: Folco de Jong
comment: I really love the way this watchface actually leaves the confines of a physical watch. If complications were added I would have no problem paying a couple of Euro's for it.

author: Ryan Reich
comment: The design is very attractive in ambient mode and the revolved view around the clock is surprisingly quick to read. It shows where on the clock you are, which gives you an immediate impression of the time of day even without reading the number of the hour.
title: An analog clock worth putting on a smartwatch

author: Sollux Captor
comment: This is a beautiful watch face but I don't know how the hell to read it, it just shows the hour with a massive red line going through the center of the display. Pretty, but not very practical
title: Beautiful watch face.

author: Hasan Rizvi
comment: Does what's its supposed to, and easy to read. Very simple and unique. Hopefully the customizations come soon, such as displaying basic weather info or battery info as there's so much unused space where a symbol and number wouldn't clutter the design but still add functionality. Last update was over 6 months ago though...
title: Simple yet functional

author: Russell Sloan
comment: Can't wait for customization.  The red line is hard to see on dimmed screen.  Would like to change to white or grey when dimmed.
title: Nice face

author: Foster McLaughlin
comment: Still my favorite watchface but not a one update? I would like something added or changed. Customizations?
title: Any updates ever?

author: Lech Deregowski
comment: This leaves a nice little pref stub in your app drawer for no reason.
title: Clutter your app drawer

author: Abu Ince
comment: Best looking watchface for the Zenwatch imho. Thanks for fixing the issues before!

reply.author: Maize
reply.content: Hi Abdullah, this issue is now fixed with version 1.3. Thanks!

title: My favorite again..

author: Mariusz Borkiet
comment: Love that and would love to see steps on it, but not sure if that wouldn't ruin the whole aesthetics. Release paid version and I'll buy it.
title: Great idea

author: David Francesconi
comment: My favourite watch face! just wish the red line in ambient mode could be made white and thicker to improve readability outdoors.
title: White line in ambient would be ace

author: Michael
comment: This watchface is fantastic. Simple, elegant, and something probably not possible in a real watch. And it's free!!
title: Unique, Stylish, Easy to Read

author: Brad Conyers
comment: Watched fixed and looks great! Good response from dev. Small suggestion, I would like to see a small red date/temp in line with the red line perhaps close to the edge to the center of the watch face. Maybe optional in the settings screen.

reply.author: Maize
reply.content: Hi Brad, this issue is now fixed with version 1.3. Thanks!

title: Looks great

author: Mason Karle
comment: Excellent watch face. Great minimalist design. Looks nice on LG G Watch (square). 4/5 because of app drawer entry. Settings for watch faces can be enabled and accessed via the Android Wear app (Spotlight does not)! Remove the app drawer settings app and it's a 5/5!

author: Chris Brooker
comment: Love the simplicity of this watch face though it is difficult to read at a glance in full sunlight.
title: Simple and elegant

author: Steven Rusling
comment: Love the watch face, this kind of unique take is the sort of thing I wish more designers would do.
title: Excellent

author: Peter Chan
comment: Replica watch faces are very nice to have, but once and awhile you want something unique. This is a cool watch face. Wish there was a way to customize with date, weather, etc. Maybe it's coming?
title: Cool watch face

comment: This is by far one of the best looking watch faces!  I know it's been asked a lot already, but little more 'smart' (date, steps, battery) would be perfect.

author: Dave Rock
comment: This is my full time watch face on my 360. Make a pro version with a few options and I'll buy it. Hell, just a few color options is enough just so I can show some support.
title: Love it!

author: james
comment: Like it, but seems abandoned. Settings app with no function

author: Osvaldo Andreaus
comment: Very fresh concept. I only hope one day the creator will allow us to customize it a bit more by choosing background and highlight color.
title: The best in my opinion.

author: Aaron Boyce
comment: Could do with a few customisation options at some point but, since I have downloaded it, this has been my watch face of choice for a fortnight.
title: Nice & Simple

comment: My favorite watchface. Could not do it better myself.
title: Absolutely simple.

author: Milk Surface
comment: The best part of having SmartWatch is having Face that couldn't exist in reality, and this is a beautiful example of that. Fav
title: Classic but imaginary

author: Vinny Tony
comment: I see a lot of people wishing it had date or weather. Meh. I have a phone for that. When I want a simple and clean face to just tell the time, this is my go to.
title: I think it's great.

author: David Moodley
comment: Great watch face, loving the unusual abstract design. Please add the ability to customize the colors. And also the tick marks inbetween the numbers.
title: Great, please add custom colors

author: Chris Powell
comment: This display should be considered a contender for representation in the MOMA. Live with it a few days and you'll understand.
title: Simple, easy to read, gentle on a 6p battery

comment: Loving this on my LG G Watch. Hopefully those customizations come soon!
title: Minimalistic

author: Miro Costa
comment: From now on this is my default watch face. This adds lots of style to my G Watch R. Thank you Dev.
title: Too much class

author: John Carbone
comment: Customizations are coming soon. Regardless, it's still an interesting watch face that takes advantage of a smart watch face.
title: Simple and beautiful.

author: Benjamin Bolton
comment: ***Update2*** time is fixed!!!!

reply.author: Maize
reply.content: Hi Benjamin, this issue is now fixed with version 1.3. Thanks!

title: Everything a modern custom face should be

author: Sultan qlifee
comment: Please add calendar entries and a 24 hour watch face that is zoomable with a click.
title: That's how I always wanted it👍

author: Michael Fox
comment: But he said that customization is coming soon but it's been over a year since the last update
title: Good face, but...

author: Joshua Smith
comment: I love this watch face, but would really like to see a military time option added.

reply.author: Maize
reply.content: Hi Joshua, this issue is now fixed with version 1.3. Thanks!

title: Beautiful!

author: Glory Lin
comment: Saw this on Reddit and really love it.  I just wish there was a date on it!
title: Currently my favorite watch face
